summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Intellisecure threat intelligence platform. All core features are working correctly including authentication, dashboard, threat detection, LLM analysis, and rule generation.

ui_bugs.issue: Custom Select components (shadcn/ui) not easily testable with standard Playwright selectors
ui_bugs.note: Form functionality works but automated testing is challenging

passed_tests: Backend API health check and all endpoints (12/12 tests passed)
Welcome page loads with modern effects and navigation buttons
Login functionality with JWT tokens and session management
Dashboard displays with correct stats (Total: 2, Critical: 0, High: 0, Medium: 1)
Dashboard shows matched attacks based on user profile tags
Dashboard insights tab shows 15 latest cybersecurity news articles
Threat card clicking opens rules dialog with Yara and Sigma rules
Background scraping task collecting threat data from multiple sources
LLM analysis processing scraped articles and creating attack profiles
Attack matching engine linking attacks to users based on industry/region/security solutions
